nodes.text: Around 20 BBY, a droid occupation was present on the planet of Onderon under the command of King Sanjay Rash, who had overthrown the real king early in the war, and this carriage was used to transport Rash to any destination. However, during the invasion, a rebellion was formed and had caused many terrorist attacks upon the droids in the city of Iziz. This carriage was one of the ambush targets.
